casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Michael COLSON, Defendant-Appellant. No. 08-10545

Non-Argument Calendar.

United States Court of Appeals, Eleventh Circuit. May 13, 2009. Randolph P. Murrell, Federal Public Defender, Tallahassee, FL, for Defendant-Appellant.

Before CARNES, WILSON and KRAVITCH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Gwendolyn Spivey, appointed counsel for Michael Colson in this direct criminal appeal, has moved to withdraw from further representation of the appellant and filed a brief pursuant to Anders v. California, 386 U.S. 738, 87 S.Ct. 1396, 18 L.Ed.2d 493 (1967). Because independent examination of the entire record reveals no arguable issues of merit, counsel’s motion to withdraw is GRANTED and Colson’s conviction and sentence are AFFIRMED.
